findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The minimumTokensBeforeSwap could produce a dramatically price volatility. If the variable set to a high number, then the contract will sell a huge amount of tokens in a single transaction.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library produces unnecessary additional gas as Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0 do not need it.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unreachable or redundant code.
